about_the_game:
Girlfriend Tapes is a visual novel where player choices matter and lead to different endings. 3+ hours of content and plenty of replayability.

The countdown for the inevitable begins! At the end of summer you and your loving girlfriend Mia will attend different colleges. The two of you will have to consolidate your relationship for long-distance. However, that’s easier said than done. You’ve started to notice slight changes in Mia’s behavior ever since she got a summer internship through a male friend who’s a bit too close for comfort. If worrying about your girlfriend wasn’t enough her best friend Riley teases you at every chance she gets which is also starting to put you at your wits' end. On top of all that you find yourself infatuated with a lewd E-girl whose content seems oddly familiar. The choices you make this summer will have a lasting effect on your future.

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts sexual acts, masturbation, nudity. Characters engage in oral, vaginal and anal sex acts. Cheating and NTR, alcohol use, crude language.
